com.stickycoding.Rokon
Class RokonMusic

java.lang.Object
  com.stickycoding.Rokon.RokonMusic

public class RokonMusic
extends java.lang.Object

RokonMusic plays one sound file, continuously or otherwise. It is suitable for background music, and should not be used for sound effects in game. MediaPlayer is used.

Author:
Richard

play

public static void play(java.lang.String filename,

Begins playing a sound file in the background

Parameters:
filename - path to a sound file in the /assets/ folder of your APK
continuous - TRUE if the sound is to loop indefinately

public static void end()
Stops the music, and cleans up the MediaPlayer. Should be called when you are finished with music.
